metadata.title: CVE-2019-15587 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Loofah gem for Ruby through v2.3.0 unsanitized JavaScript may occurin sanitized output when a crafted SVG element is republished.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15587` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-loofah - 2.3.1+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-loofah package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.1+dfsg-1').
